document_data.name: Blaspheme
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blaspheme''' was a rebel [[udadrow]] group of former [[drider]]s who fought against the [[Church of Lolth|clergy]] of [[Lolth]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 15th century [[Marking the years|DR]].
document_data.Organization:
The Blaspheme were led by [[Malfoosh|Mal'a'voselle Amvas Tol]], who had led the drider contingent in the Demonweb Pits.<ref>{{cite book/Relentless|437}}
{{sectstub}}
document_data.Members: [[Dinin Do'Urden]], the half-brother of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] was a member. Though he initially assumed an alias of a houseless male named Dininae to avoid being recognized as such.
